actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a 1-year extension of the depreciation rules relating to the rehabilitation of low-income housing.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to postpone from 1978 to 1980 the termination of the 60-month, straight line depreciation deduction for rehabilitating low-income rental housing.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide for a 1-year extension of the depreciation rules relating to the rehabilitation of low-income housing.
